rules.name: Executive Summary Present
rules.description: The report must contain an executive summary that provides a high-level overview of the audit scope, objectives, and key findings.

rules.name: Audit Period Clearly Stated
rules.description: The report must clearly state the audit period, including the start and end dates of the examination.

rules.name: Service Organization Description
rules.description: The report must include a detailed description of the service organization's system, including the services provided and system boundaries.

rules.name: Control Objectives Defined
rules.description: The report must clearly define control objectives that the controls are intended to achieve.

rules.name: Auditor Opinion Included
rules.description: The report must include the auditor's opinion on whether the controls were suitably designed and operating effectively.

rules.name: Management Assertion Present
rules.description: The report must contain management's assertion about the effectiveness of controls.

rules.name: Test of Controls Documentation
rules.description: For Type 2 reports, the report must document tests of controls performed by the auditor.

rules.name: Exception Reporting
rules.description: Any exceptions or deficiencies in controls must be clearly documented with their impact.

rules.name: Trust Services Criteria Referenced
rules.description: The report must reference the appropriate Trust Services Criteria (Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, Privacy).

rules.name: Third-Party Assurance
rules.description: The report must be prepared by an independent qualified auditor or audit firm.
